problem_text_cn: 如图,已知线段AB=9,BC=5,点D为线段AC的中点,则线段AD的长度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the line segment AB = N_0, BC = N_1, and the point D is the midpoint of the line segment AC, then the length of the line segment AD is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是两点间的距离,熟知各线段之间的和、差及倍数关系是解答此题的关键．
